description: ff. 80. 173 x 110; 116 x 54 mm. 11 lin. Muḥarram 1019. Abdrigment of Part 3 of Miftāḥ al-ʻulūm by Yūsuf ibn Abī Bakr al-Sakkākī (d. 626/1229): Brockelmann, GAL, I, 353 (Ausz. 1); S I, 516. Incip.: ... الحمد لله على ما انعم ... اما بعد فلما کان علم البلاغة
author: Qazwīnī, Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1267 or 1268-1338
creator: Qazwīnī, Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1267 or 1268-1338
